Misc

datasource_lk
A list of all data sources used in the package to be updated as needed.
manual_iso3_lk
Manual ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code entries that don't get parsed in get_onetable()
owid_lk
OWID location renamings
who_lk
WHO Country renamings / rebinnings
who_region_lk
WHO "pretty" english region names
income_aes
Aesthetics for World Bank Country income group
state_aes
Aesthetics for US Department of State regions
who_aes
Aesthetics for WHO regions
cia_wfb_addn_countries
Countries with no current UNWPP data that are manually updated here from CIA World Factbook https://www.cia.gov/the-world-factbook/field/population/country-comparison Currently 2022 estimates are being used
onetable_addn_countries
Additional entries not acknowledged by WHO but required to create onetable
